title: Higher ping only in Ranked (Looking for response from Riot Dev)
body:
Hey,

So recently since a couple of days ago I've noticed my ping being increased from 25 to about 71. The ping is constant, and if this happened in all games I would be sure it's an issue on my end.

But it's odd.

The ping only occurs in ranked. I play a blind normal's, I enjoy my regular ping. Hop into ranked soon after, and bam, 71 ping constant.

I am with TPG, and I am not sure if this is strictly only myself, or all TPG users. If a Riot dev could give me an update or check-up so I can further isolate the problem that would be really handy.

Thanks.

replies.body:
Hey Caerus,

I'm sorry to hear that you're encountering connection issues to the League of Legends servers. Before we start looking at factors that may be causing these issues on the ISP end, I'd first like to confirm that the issue does not lay on your end of things. Can you try as many solutions as you can that are provided in the [**Troubleshooting Connection Issues**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) Riot Games Support article?

If those solutions don't work, let's start looking into the diagnostics and see where the issue may be originating. To do this, we'll need you to provide some information for us: 

1. Confirmation that you've tried the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues article
2. ISP that you're using
3. Region and/or State
4. Trace Route (Tracert) - If you're unsure how to do this, check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2)
5. When did these issues begin occurring, and how often?
6. Additional information you'd like to provide

Thank you for your time.

**Confirmation that you've tried the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues article**
Yes

**ISP that you're using**
 TPG

**Region and/or State**
 NSW

**Trace Route (Tracert) **
Tracing route to 103.240.227.5 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1     1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  RTA1025W.home [192.168.1.1] 
  2     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  3    56 ms    19 ms    19 ms  syd-sot-ken-csw1-Po-40.tpgi.com.au [202.7.173.157] 
  4     *       31 ms    31 ms  203-219-106-254.tpgi.com.au [203.219.106.254] 
  5     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  6     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  7     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  8     *        *        *     Request timed out.

etc etc.. till 30.

**When did these issues begin occurring, and how often?** 
2 days ago, consistently in Ranked.

There.
It appears this may be an ISP-related issue. I would contact them with the information you've provided here so they can look to see where the issue lies.
